content:
Prompted by [Calum](https://calumryan.com) publishing an [indie event page](https://calumryan.com/event/hwc-20160824/) for the next Homebrew Website Club meeting in London, I've modified this site to support sending [RSVP](https://indieweb.org/rsvp)s. 

Nice way of prioritising features: wait until you have a use-case before building.
